cause.description:
People go to jail or are killed because drugs are illegal. By making them legal people can smoke up when they want and won't have too worry about getting arrested.
1. Drugs are'nt a problem unless you want them to be
2. People can do whatever they want too
3. They make you feel good
cause.mission: Legalise weed because it will stop a lot of problems and people have the right to smoke weed if they want.
cause.name: Legalise Weed
